text: I'm thinking about a new language though. One that could really incentivize developers. So - everytime they write a character it costs 0.0001 cents, every bug costs 0.001 cents. Each successful unique build yields 0.0001 cents. Thinking of calling it "captialism lang". Think about it you could really flaunt your status by naming variables like "newvariabletostore10floats"
